link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
J. C. Lagarias, E. M. Rains and N. J. A. Sloane, The EKG sequence, Exper. Math. 11 (2002), 437-446.
Index entries for sequences related to EKG sequence
mathematica: ekg[s_] := Block[{m = s[[-1]], k = 3}, While[MemberQ[s, k] || GCD[m, k] == 1, k++]; Append[s, k]]; Nest[ekg, {1, 2}, 100] // Differences (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Sep 10 2018, after _Robert G. Wilson v_ *)
